author: jwaldman
msg: begin fix for allowing different prefixes in css file besides af|.

author: mriou
msg: I think it makes more sense to have the lvalue set as the wrapper element when it's a text node. Otherwise casting it to an Element (for the replaceElement logic when lvaluePtr and rvalue are both Elements) will fail. Beside it doesn't seem to break other assignments (replaceContent overwrites it).

author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-561.  Fix DFS to write one replica of each block locally, if possible.  Contributed by Dhruba.
